version_description: 1. Bugs fixed.
* Minor bug fixes & performance tweaks.

Push to Puffin - Single click to send a web page from Desktop Browser to Mobile.
A better way to extend your Internet browsing to mobile devices.
Synchronize Chrome bookmarks automatically.
- performance improvements and bugfixes
* New Data Savings feature let you fine tune image compression and Flash quality to save more data usage.

* Fix bug that some Flash games can not play correctly on iPhone portrait mode.
* Fix bug that some text input control can not set caret while editing.

* Fix bug that some Flash games can not play correctly on iPhone portrait mode.
* Fix bug that some text input control can not set caret while editing.

* Fix bug that some Flash games can not play correctly on iPhone portrait mode.
* Fix bug that some text input control can not set caret while editing.

* Reduces server connect time, especially on low speed network.
* Improves page load speed.
* Bug fixes.

The new Puffin 5 is the smartest mobile browser, and it does more with less. There are dozens of new features that we'd love for you to check out in this release.
 
Several Highlights:
* Elegant and simple user interface design and intuitive app navigation
* Brilliant data savings with usage statistics   
* Improvements in speed and page loading
* Latest Flash support with security patches
* iPad split view support
* Bug and stability fixes

We hope you enjoy Puffin!

Dear users, we heard you and we're taking action!

Thank you for all the valuable feedback. We added more features and fixed several reported issues in this release.

1) Smart Desktop mode for better Flash support.
2) Editing tools for copy, paste & done.
3) Easy-to-use tab history by long pressing 'Back' or 'Forward' button.
4) Useful tools on the menu.
5) Tools for importing bookmarks.
6) Bug fixes and performance improvements

More features are coming out soon. Please stay tuned; we will continue to build awesome apps for you. If you like our work, please give us a 5 star rating!

Thank you for all the valuable feedback. We added more features and fixed several reported issues in this release.

1) Smart News feed design (turn it on/off in Settings)
2) Custom background theme 
3) Easy-to-use text selection
4) Tools for importing bookmarks
5) Handy Drag-n-Drop in Theater mode
6) Several Bug fixes and performance improvements

We will continue to build awesome apps for you. If you like our work, please give us a 5 star rating!
Thank you for your valuable feedback. We fixed many bugs in this release, especially those reported by the users.

Many users told us that they love the new start page design, and they also want to have more options on it. We heard you and we're taking action! 
 
Users now can easily access their most visited sites, Bookmarks, History, Downloads, and Settings right from the start page. Furthermore, we added support for more gestures for video playback. Users can fast forward or backward with simple swipes.  
 
We hope you enjoy Olympics with Puffin in this summer, and we will continue to build awesome apps for you.

Dear User, We heard you and we're taking Action! Thanks to all valuable feedback, we added more features and fixed several reported issues in this release.

1) Support 3D touch (home screen quick actions)
2) Bug fixes and performance improvements

Happy Halloween! We'd like to gift you a set of cute Puffin iMessage stickers. Have a great holiday with friends on iMessage & Puffin.

Great new features also available in this update:
* Pull down current page to reload / close tab / add new tab
* QR Code scanner
* Push to puffin (support safari share extension)
* Support uploading multiple files
* Better navigation UX when choosing the menu items (bookmarks/history/downloads) 
* Minor UI changes on the start page

â€» Please note that iMessage sticker feature is only available on iOS 10.
* Fix crashes and improve stability

Tired of black or white backgrounds? Puffin Browser proudly presents "Special Holiday Themes". Try them out for a warm holiday feel! ! 

Several known issues have been fixed in this update:
* Fixed random loss of connections.
* Fixed several crashes and freezes.
* Improved connection speed for users in Southeast Asian counties.

Thanks again for using Puffin. We wish you a wonderful holiday season.

Several known issues have been fixed in this update:
* Fixed several crashes and freezes.
* Improved connection speed for users in Southeast Asian counties.
* Support the new iOS devices.

Thanks again for using Puffin.
